name: Swords and Bots
description:
Your goal is to defend the power supply as you are raided by robots.

WASD to Move

E to shoot a projectile (there is cooldown)

Left-Click to swing sword

Right-click to Block

DISCLAIMER: if you experience any bugs, glitches, or problems, don't be surprised since we had so much more to add to the game and so little time to do it. but if you do experience any bugs, glitches, or problems let us know!

Made for the ScoreSpace #17 Game Jam

Credits:

Andre the Shill - 3D model designer and Sound effect designer.

Evan the Shill - Coder, Animations manager, and UI designer.
